title: His Every Defense
description: For His Pleasure is a New York Times and USA Today bestselling series, and with each new book, the romance only gets hotter. Kallie Young has been invited to stay at heartthrob Hunter Reardon's house while she recovers from her brutal assault at the hands of a stranger. And although Hunter shows her his sensitive side, he also manages to stay as elusive as ever. When a strange detective comes snooping around, Hunter and Kallie soon find themselves on the wrong end of a police investigation. As well, a series of miscommunications between the couple leads Kallie to take certain business matters into her own hands.  In the end, Kallie and Hunter face the most daunting challenge of their lives, and Hunter will make a last desperate stand for the woman he loves. His Every Defense (For His Pleasure, Book 10) is a 30,000 word tale of lust, submission, power and ultimately--a love story for the ages.
author: Kelly Favor
